parameters.name: X-CSRF-TOKEN-URC
parameters.description: Anti forgery token generated by ASP.NET

requestBody.description: Comma separated list of keywords being searched for

keywords.description: Comma separated list of keywords being searched for

200.description: An array of zero or more student summaries (including name, uID, GPA, skills, personal statement excerpt, and application id)

post.summary: Set if a student is actively applying for research

id.description: The ID of the student. This is not the same as the uID.

state.description: Either the string "apply" or "remove". The former means the student is looking for a position, and the latter does not.

204.description: The student data was successfully updated to reflect if they are looking for a position or not.

400.description: State was not one of "apply" or "remove" or user does not own application.

404.description: No student nor application with the given IDs could be found.
